casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. SMUCKER
v.
BLACKWELL. 2018-0236 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 25, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Prohibition. On respondents' motion for judgment on pleadings and pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 12.04. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. On relator's motion to correct clerk's refusal to file documents. Motion denied as moot.
